thread.title: Watch List for Oct. 9
thread.title_full: Watch List for Oct. 9 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Watch List for Oct. 9
text:
FRIDAY’S LIVE EVENTS
Horse Racing
• Batavia Downs, 6:35 p.m.
ON TELEVISION

• Sprint Cup Bank of America 500 Final Practice, 6:30 p.m., NBCSN.
• Xfinity Drive for the Cure 300, 8 p.m., NBCSN.
